message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with deep neural networks and their application in class incremental learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper also discusses techniques such as knowledge distillation and weight alignment, which are commonly used in deep learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses the problem of catastrophic forgetting, which is a common issue in neural networks, making cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on image classification datasets, which falls under the sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language).
